title: Meet the budget-friendly smartwatch alternative to Apple Watch
description:
We all like the idea of having the most up-to-date technology, but it’s just not always practical. Tech is expensive, especially if you’re looking for wearables like smartwatches.

But you don’t have to break the bank to get a smartwatch. For a limited time, you can get the Chronowatch C-Max Call Time Smartwatch for a specially reduced price of just $34.97.

The C-Max Call Time is a basic smartwatch designed to support exercise and health initiatives. The 1.7″ full-color touchscreen display gives you access to 14 features right on your wrist, while the soft silicone band makes it comfortable to wear all day, every day. On the watch, you can make and answer calls, view messages, check the weather, control your music, and manage your alarms and activities. If you’re using it for fitness and health, there’s also a sleep monitoring system, a stopwatch, and multiple fitness tracking and health monitoring modes. It’s IP67 waterproof so it will stand tough through all of your workouts.

Save money when you upgrade to a smartwatch. Right now, you can get the Chronowatch C-Max Call Time Smartwatch for 65% off $99 at just $34.97.
